mapper.sql: ID, ORDER_NUM, ORDER_SOURCE, MATERIAL_CODE, MATERIAL_NAME, AMOUNT, MEASURE_UNIT, UNIT_PRICE, SUM_PRICE, START_DATE, END_DATE, ADDRESS, AUTHOR_ID, AUTHOR, PHONE, FAX, EMAIL, REMARK, STOCK_ID, ENQUIRE_ID, CONT_APP_ID, QUOTE_ID, CONT_ID, STATUS
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from orders
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into orders (ID, ORDER_NUM, ORDER_SOURCE, MATERIAL_CODE, MATERIAL_NAME, AMOUNT, MEASURE_UNIT, UNIT_PRICE, SUM_PRICE, START_DATE, END_DATE, ADDRESS, AUTHOR_ID, AUTHOR, PHONE, FAX, EMAIL, REMARK, STOCK_ID, ENQUIRE_ID, CONT_APP_ID, QUOTE_ID, CONT_ID, STATUS ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{materialCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{materialName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{measureUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sumPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stockId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{enquireId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{contAppId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{quoteId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{contId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

update orders
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ORDER_NUM = #{record.orderNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_SOURCE = #{record.orderSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MATERIAL_CODE = #{record.materialCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
